title: Prey for the Gods Is Basically Shadow Of The Colossus, For The PC
text:
Prey for the Gods Is Basically Shadow Of The Colossus, For The PC 
Published By: Kotaku.com - Today 
A bleak landscape, battles against massive enemies which you can climb over...Prey for the Gods is as Shadow of the Colossus as you can get ...
